## Description

Today, we'll continue our conversation on the dynamics of homeownership in the United States, focusing on disparities in access to homeownership opportunities, and the implications of these disparities for the building and transfer of wealth.

## Learning Goals

-   Articulate some of the risks and rewards associated with owner-occupied housing.
-   Understand how access to capital and access to ownership opportunities has been used as a means of underscoring spatial segregation and inequality.
